page.title: 14HOME LIFE in Welwyn G.C.
page.content: The{life style}for many households is dependant upon the requirements of the adults' employment.Children of school age often take their main meal in the evening when the adults eat. A simple survey of 20 families showed 50% with 2 or more{wage-earners.} Just over half had lived in the same house for over 5 years. Nearly all {heating is by gas}but 75%{cook by} {electricity.}Many claim to use few convenience foods but a few use them frequently. About half grow some of their own food. 75% shop in the town centre, just a few shop out of town. Among the younger population there is an interest in physical recreation but much time is spent watching t/v. More than 75% keep{pets,}with cats outnumbering the dogs.
